articles.title: Friend or foe: Can computer coders trust ChatGPT? - BBC
articles.description: The artificial intelligence ChatGPT can write computer code, but its help comes with many potential problems.
articles.content:
"It felt like magic to me," says Pietro Schirano. "It scared me a little bit because it was so good."
He's talking about the latest version of ChatGPT, an artificial intelligence (AI) tool. You type… [+7464 chars]
